articles.title: Apple AirPods Pro 2 cut to best-ever price in Amazon Black Friday sale - Cyclingnews
articles.description: The Black Friday sale delivers another epic Apple deal
articles.content:
The Black Friday deals keep getting better, especially for one of our favourite (but one of the most expensive) brands - Apple.
